# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-110">중요 한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-113">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-114">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-115">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-116">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-117">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-118">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-119">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-120">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-121">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-122">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-123">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 연속 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-124">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-125">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-126">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-127">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-128">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-129">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-130">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-130">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-131">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-131">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-141">bankrouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-141">bankrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-142">bankroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-142">bankroutingnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-144">routing no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-144">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-145">라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-145">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-146">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-146">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-147">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-147">routing#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-148">RTN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-148">RTN</span></span>


## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-149">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-150">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-151">마침표가 있거나 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-151">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-153">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-154">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-155">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-156">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-157">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-158">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-159">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-160">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-161">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-162">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-163">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-164">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-169">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-169">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-170">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-170">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-171">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-171">documento nacional de identidad</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-176">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-177">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-178">뱅크 상태 번호를 포함 하거나 제외 하 고 6 ~ 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-180">계정 번호는 6 ~ 10 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-181">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-182">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-183">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-184">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-185">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-186">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-187">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-189">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-190">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-191">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-192">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-193">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-194">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-210">오스트레일리아 근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-210">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-211">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-212">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-213">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-214">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-215">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-217">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-218">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-219">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-220">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-221">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-222">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-223">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-224">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-225">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-226">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-227">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-228">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-229">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-232">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-233">Keywords_australian_business_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-234">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-235">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-250">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-252">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-253">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-254">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-255">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-256">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-257">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-258">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-259">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-260">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-261">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-262">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-265">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-266">Keyword_Australian_Company_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-267">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-268">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-278">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-279">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-280">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-281">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-282">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-283">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-284">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-285">5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-286">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-287">1 ~ 2 개의 선택적 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-288">4 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-289">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-290">9 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-291">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-292">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-294">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-295">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-296">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-297">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-397">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-398">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-399">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-401">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-402">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-403">9 번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-404">10 번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-405">11 번째 숫자 (선택 사항)는 개별 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-406">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-407">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-408">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-410">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-411">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-412">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-424">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-425">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-426">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-428">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-429">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-430">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-431">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-432">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-433">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-434">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-468">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-469">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-470">8 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-471">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-472">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백을 사용 하 여 표시 되는 8 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-473">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-474">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-475">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-476">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-477">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-478">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-479">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-480">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-481">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-482">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-483">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-484">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-495">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-495">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-496">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-497">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-497">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-498">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-499">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-499">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-500">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-501">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-501">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-502">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-503">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-504">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-505">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-506">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-506">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-507">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-507">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-634">오스트리아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-634">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-635">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-635">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-636">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-636">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-637">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-637">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-638">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-638">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-639">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-639">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-640">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-640">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-641">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-642">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-642">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-643">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-644">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-644">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-645">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-645">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-646">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-646">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-647">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-648">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-648">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-649">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-650">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-650">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-651">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-651">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-652">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-652">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-653">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-653">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-654">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-654">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-655">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-655">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-656">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-656">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-657">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-657">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-658">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-658">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-659">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-659">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-661">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-661">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-663">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-663">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-664">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-664">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-665">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-665">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-666">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-666">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-667">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-668">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-668">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-670">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-671">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-671">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-672">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-672">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-693">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-693">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-694">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-694">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-696">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-696">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-698">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-698">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-699">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-699">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-700">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-700">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-701">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-701">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-702">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-702">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-703">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-703">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-704">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-704">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-705">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-705">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-706">함수 ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-706">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-707">_or_equivalent '는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-707">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-708">from 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-708">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-709">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-709">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-710">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-710">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-721">보험 코드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-721">insurance code#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-722">사회 alsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-722">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-723">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-723">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-724">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-724">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-725">versicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-725">versicherungsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-726">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-726">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-727">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-728">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-728">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-729">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-730">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-730">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-731">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-731">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-732">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-732">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-733">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-733">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-734">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-734">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-735">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-735">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-736">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-737">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-737">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-738">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-739">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-740">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-740">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-741">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-741">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-742">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-742">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-743">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-743">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-744">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-744">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-745">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-745">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-746">österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-746">österreich</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-747">st.nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-747">st.nr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-748">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-748">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-749">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-749">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-750">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-750">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-751">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-751">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-752">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-752">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-753">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-753">tax no</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-766">오스트리아 값 추가 된 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-766">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-767">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-767">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-768">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-768">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-769">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-769">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-770">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-770">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-771">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-771">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-772">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-772">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-773">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-774">11 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-774">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-775">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-776">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-776">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-777">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-777">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-778">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-778">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-779">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-779">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-780">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-780">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-781">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-781">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-782">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-782">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-783">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-783">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-784">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-784">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-785">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-785">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-786">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-786">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-787">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-788">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-789">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-790">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-791">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-791">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-792">Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-792">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-793">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-794">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-794">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-795">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-795">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-796">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-796">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-797">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-797">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-798">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-798">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-799">오스트리아 vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-799">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-800">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-800">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-801">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-801">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-802">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-802">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-803">오스트리아-vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-803">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-804">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-804">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-805">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-805">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-806">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-806">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-807">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-807">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-808">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-808">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-809">vat 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-809">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-810">atu 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-810">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-811">uid 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-811">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-812">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-812">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-813">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-814">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-814">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-815">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-815">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-816">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-816">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-817">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-817">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-818">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-818">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-819">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-819">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-820">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-820">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-821">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-822">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-822">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-823">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-824">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-824">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-825">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-825">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-826">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-826">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-827">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-827">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-828">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-828">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-829">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-829">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-830">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-830">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-831">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-831">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-832">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-832">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-833">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-833">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-834">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-834">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-835">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-835">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-836">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-836">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-837">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-837">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-838">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-838">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-839">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-839">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-840">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-840">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-841">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-841">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-842">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-843">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-843">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-844">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-844">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-845">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-845">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-846">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-846">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-847">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-847">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-848">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-848">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-849">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-849">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-850">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-850">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-851">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-851">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-852">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-852">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-853">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-853">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-854">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-854">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-855">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-855">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-856">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-856">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-857">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-857">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-858">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-858">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-859">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-859">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-860">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-860">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-861">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-861">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-862">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-862">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-863">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-863">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-864">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-865">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-865">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-866">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-867">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-867">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-868">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-868">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-869">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-869">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-870">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-870">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-877">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-877">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-878">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-878">localhost</span></span>
