- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1765">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1765">номер на паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1766">номер на паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1766">номер на паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1767">паспорт 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1767">паспорт №</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1768">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1768">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1769">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1769">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1770">7 또는 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1770">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1771">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1771">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1772">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1772">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1773">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1773">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1774">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1774">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1775">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1775">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1776">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1776">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1777">제로 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1777">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1778">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1778">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1779">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1780">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1780">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1781">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1782">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1782">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1783">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1783">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1784">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1784">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1785">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1785">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1786">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1786">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1787">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1787">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1788">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1788">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1789">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1789">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1812">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1812">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1813">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1814">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1814">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1815">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1815">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1816">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1816">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1817">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1818">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1819">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1820">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1820">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1821">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1821">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1822">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1822">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1823">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1823">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1959">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1959">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1960">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1961">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1961">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1962">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1963">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1963">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1964">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1965">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1965">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1966">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1967">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1967">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1968">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1968">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1969">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1969">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1970">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1970">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1972">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1972">personal health number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1974">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1974">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1975">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1975">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1976">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1976">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1977">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1977">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1978">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1978">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1979">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1979">workers compensation</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1981">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1981">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1982">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1983">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1983">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1984">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1985">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1985">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1986">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1987">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1987">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1988">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1989">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1990">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1990">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-1991">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-1991">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2024">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2024">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2025">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2025">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2026">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2026">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2027">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2027">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2028">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2028">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2029">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2029">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2030">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2030">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2031">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2031">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2064">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2064">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2065">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2066">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2066">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2067">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2068">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2068">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2069">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2069">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2070">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2070">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2071">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2071">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2072">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2072">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2073">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2073">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2074">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2074">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2075">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2076">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2076">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2077">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2078">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2078">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2079">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2079">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2080">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2080">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2081">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2081">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2082">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2082">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2083">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2083">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2084">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2084">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2085">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2085">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2086">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2086">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2087">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2087">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2088">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2088">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2113">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2113">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2114">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2115">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호, 검사 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2115">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2116">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2117">7 ~ 8 자리와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2117">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2118">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2118">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2119">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2119">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2120">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2120">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2121">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2121">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2122">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2122">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2123">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2123">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2124">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2124">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2125">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2126">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2126">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2127">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2128">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2128">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2129">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2129">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2130">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2130">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2131">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2132">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2132">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2133">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2133">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2134">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2134">The checksum passes.</span></span>


## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2171">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2171">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2172">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2173">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2173">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2174">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2175">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2175">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2176">주소 코드에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2176">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2177">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2177">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2178">주문 코드에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2178">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2179">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2179">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2180">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2181">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2182">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2183">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2183">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2184">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2184">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2185">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2185">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2186">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2186">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2187">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2187">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2188">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2188">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2189">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2189">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2191">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2191">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2192">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2192">Resident Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2197">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2197">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2198">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2198">鉴定</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2200">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2200">居民 身份證</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2202">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2202">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2203">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2204">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2204">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2205">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2206">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2206">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2207">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2208">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2208">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2209">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2210">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2210">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2211">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2211">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2212">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2212">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2213">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2213">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2214">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2214">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2215">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2215">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2216">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2216">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2217">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2218">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2218">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2219">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2479">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2479">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2480">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2480">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2481">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2482">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2482">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2483">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2484">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2484">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2485">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2486">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2486">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2487">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2488">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2489">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2489">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2490">From `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2490">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2491">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2491">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2492">Keywords_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2492">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2614">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2614">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2615">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2615">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2616">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2617">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2617">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2618">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2619">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2619">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2620">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2621">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2622">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2623">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2624">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2624">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2625">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2625">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2656">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2656">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2657">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2657">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2658">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2659">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2659">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2660">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2661">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2661">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2662">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2663">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2663">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2664">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2665">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2665">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2666">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2666">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2667">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2667">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2685">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2685">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2686">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2687">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2687">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2688">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2689">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2689">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2690">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2690">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2691">최종 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2691">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2692">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2693">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2693">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2694">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2696">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2696">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2697">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2697">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2698">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2698">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2699">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2700">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2700">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2701">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2701">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2732">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2732">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2733">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2733">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2734">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2734">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2735">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2735">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2736">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2736">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2737">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2737">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2738">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2738">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2739">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2739">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2740">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2741">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2741">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2742">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2743">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2743">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2744">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2744">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2745">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2745">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2746">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2746">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2747">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2747">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2764">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2764">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2765">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2765">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2766">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2767">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2767">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2768">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2769">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2769">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2770">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2770">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2771">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2771">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2772">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2772">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2773">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2773">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2774">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2774">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2775">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2775">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2900">키프로스 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2900">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2901">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2901">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2902">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2902">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2903">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2903">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2904">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2904">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2905">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2905">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2906">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2906">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2907">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2907">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2908">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2908">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2909">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2909">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2910">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2910">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2911">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2911">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2912">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2912">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2913">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2913">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2914">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2914">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2915">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2915">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2916">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2916">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2917">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2917">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2919">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2919">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2920">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2920">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2921">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2921">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2922">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2922">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2923">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2923">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2924">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2924">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2925">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2925">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2926">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2926">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2927">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2928">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2928">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2929">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2929">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2930">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2930">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2931">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2932">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2932">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2933">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2934">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2934">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2935">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2935">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2936">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2936">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2937">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2937">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2939">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2939">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2940">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2940">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2941">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2941">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2942">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2942">passports</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2962">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2962">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2963">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2963">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2964">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2964">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2965">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2965">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2966">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2966">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2967">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2967">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2968">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2968">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2969">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2970">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2970">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2971">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2972">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2972">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2973">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2973">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2974">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2974">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2975">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2975">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2976">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2977">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2977">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2978">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2979">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2980">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2980">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2981">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2981">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2982">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-2983">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-2983">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3011">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3011">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3012">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3012">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3013">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3014">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3014">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3015">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3016">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3016">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3017">' E ' 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3017">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3018">a 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3018">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3019">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3019">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3020">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3020">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3021">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3022">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3023">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3024">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3024">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3025">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3025">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3026">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3152">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3152">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3153">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3153">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3154">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3155">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3156">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3157">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3158">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3159">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3160">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3161">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3161">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3162">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3163">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3164">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3164">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3166">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3166">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3167">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3167">passport #</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3182">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3182">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3183">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3184">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3184">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3186">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3186">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3187">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3187">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3188">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3188">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3189">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3189">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3190">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3190">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3191">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3191">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3192">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3192">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3193">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3193">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3194">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3195">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3195">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3196">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3197">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3197">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3198">Func_czech_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3198">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3199">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3199">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3200">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3201">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3201">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3202">Func_czech_id_card_new_format 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3202">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3203">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```
