## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3250">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3250">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3251">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3251">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3252">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3253">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3253">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3254">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3255">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3255">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3256">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3256">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3257">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3257">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3258">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3258">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3259">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3259">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3260">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3261">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3261">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3262">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3263">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3263">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3264">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3264">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3265">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3265">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3266">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3267">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3267">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3268">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3268">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3269">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3269">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3270">돌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3270">birth number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3283">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3283">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3284">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3284">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3285">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3286">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3286">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3288">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3288">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3289">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3290">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3290">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3291">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3292">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3292">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3293">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3293">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3294">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3294">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3418">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3418">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3419">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3419">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3420">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3420">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3421">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3421">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3422">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3422">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3423">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3423">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3424">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3424">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3425">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3425">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3426">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3426">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3427">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3427">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3428">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3428">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3429">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3429">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3446">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3446">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3447">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3448">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3448">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3450">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3450">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3451">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3451">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3452">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3452">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3453">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3453">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3454">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3454">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3455">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3455">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3456">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3456">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3457">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3457">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3458">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3458">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3459">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3459">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3460">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3460">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3461">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3461">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3462">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3462">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3463">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3463">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3535">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3535">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3536">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3536">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3537">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3538">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3538">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3539">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3540">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3540">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3541">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3541">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3542">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3542">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3543">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3543">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3544">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3545">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3545">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3546">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3547">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3547">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3548">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3548">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3549">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3549">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3550">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3550">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3551">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3551">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3552">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3552">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3553">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3553">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3554">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3554">personal identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3557">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3557">nationalnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3559">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3559">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3560">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3560">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3561">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3561">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3562">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3562">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3563">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3563">cpr-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3564">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3564">personnummer</span></span>


## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3565">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3565">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3566">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3566">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3567">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3567">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3568">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3568">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3569">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3569">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3570">이 가능한 문자 집합에서의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함): abcdefghjklmnprstux (등록자 성의 코드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3570">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3571">1 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 등록자 성의의 성 또는 숫자 ' 9 '의 첫 번째 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3571">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3572">검사 숫자의 마지막 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3572">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3573">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3574">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3574">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3575">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3576">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3576">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3577">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3577">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3578">From 키워드를 `Keyword_dea_number` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3578">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3579">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3579">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3580">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3580">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3581">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3581">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3582">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3582">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3583">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3583">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3584">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3584">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3585">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3585">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3586">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3586">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3587">마약 적용 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3587">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3588">마약 적용 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3588">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3589">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3589">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3590">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3590">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3591">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3592">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3592">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3593">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3594">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3594">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3595">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3595">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3596">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3596">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3597">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3598">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3598">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3599">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3600">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3601">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3601">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3602">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3728">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3728">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3729">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3729">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3730">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3730">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3731">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3731">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3732">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3732">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3733">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3733">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3734">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3734">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3735">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3736">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3736">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3737">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3738">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3738">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3739">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3739">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3740">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3740">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3741">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3741">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3742">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3742">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3743">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3743">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3744">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3744">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3745">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3745">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3746">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3746">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3747">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3747">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3748">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3748">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3749">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3749">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3750">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3750">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3783">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3783">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3784">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3784">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3785">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3786">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3786">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3787">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3788">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3788">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3789">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3790">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3790">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3791">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3792">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3792">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3793">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3793">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3794">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3794">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3795">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3795">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3797">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3797">passport#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3799">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3799">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3800">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3800">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3801">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3801">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3804">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3804">passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3808">eesti kodaniku pass si 번호 passinumbrid 문서 번호 문서에 dokumendi veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3808">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3809">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3809">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3810">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3810">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3811">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3811">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3812">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3812">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3813">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3813">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3814">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3815">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3815">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3816">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3817">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3817">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3818">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3818">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3819">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3819">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3820">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3820">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3821">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3821">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3822">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3822">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3823">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3823">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3824">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3824">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-3825">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-3825">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4271">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4271">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4272">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4272">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4273">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4273">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4274">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4274">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4275">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4275">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4276">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4276">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4277">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4277">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4278">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4278">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4279">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4279">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4280">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4280">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4281">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4282">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4282">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4283">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4284">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4285">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4285">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4286">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4286">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4417">핀란드 유럽 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4417">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4418">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4419">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4420">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4421">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4422">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4423">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4424">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4425">20 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4425">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4426">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4426">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4427">20 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4427">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4428">10 자리 숫자-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4428">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4429">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4429">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4430">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4430">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4431">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4432">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4432">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4433">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4434">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4434">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4435">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4435">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4436">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4436">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4454">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4454">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4455">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4456">6 자리 숫자와 세기를 나타내는 문자 및 3 자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4456">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4457">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4458">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4458">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4459">생년월일에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4459">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4460">세기 표식 ('-', ' + ' 또는 ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4460">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4461">3 자리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4461">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4462">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4462">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4463">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4464">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4464">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4465">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4466">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4466">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4467">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4467">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4468">Keyword_finnish_national_id에서 키워드를 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4468">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4469">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4469">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4470">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4470">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4471">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4471">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4472">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4472">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4521">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4521">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4522">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4522">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4523">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4523">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4524">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4524">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4525">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4525">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4526">9 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4526">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4527">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4527">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4528">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4528">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4529">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4530">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4530">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4531">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4532">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4532">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4533">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4533">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4534">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common 또는 Keyword_finland_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4534">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4535">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4535">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4537">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4537">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4538">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4538">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4539">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4539">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4540">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4540">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4541">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4541">passportno</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4555">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4555">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4556">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4556">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4557">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4558">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4558">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4559">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4560">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4560">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4561">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4561">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4562">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4562">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4563">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4563">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4564">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4564">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4565">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4565">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4566">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4566">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4567">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4567">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4568">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4569">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4570">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4571">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4572">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4572">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4573">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4573">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4574">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4575">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4575">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4599">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4599">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4600">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4600">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4601">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4602">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4602">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4603">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4604">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4604">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4605">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4605">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4606">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4606">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4607">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4607">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4608">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4608">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4609">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4609">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4610">Keyword_french_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4610">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4737">프랑스 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4737">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4738">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4738">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4739">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4739">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4740">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4740">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4741">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4741">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4742">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4742">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4743">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4743">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4744">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4745">21 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4745">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4747">21 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4747">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4748">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4748">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4749">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4749">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4750">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4750">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4751">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4751">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4752">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4752">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4753">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4754">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4754">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4755">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4757">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4757">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4758">Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4758">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4759">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4759">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4760">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4760">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4761">보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4761">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4762">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4762">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4763">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4763">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4764">프랑스 국가 id 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4764">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4765">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4765">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4766">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4766">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4767">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4767">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4768">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4768">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4769">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4769">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4770">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4770">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4771">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4771">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4772">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4772">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4773">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4773">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4774">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4774">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4775">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4775">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4777">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4777">card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4778">carte nationale d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4778">carte nationale d’identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4779">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4779">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4780">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4780">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4781">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4781">cni</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4783">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4783">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4784">국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4784">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4785">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4785">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4786">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4786">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4787">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4787">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4788">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4788">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4789">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4789">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4790">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4791">9 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4791">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4792">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4793">9 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4793">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4794">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4794">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4795">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4795">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4796">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4796">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4797">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4798">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4798">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4799">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4800">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4800">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4801">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4801">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4802">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4802">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4814">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4814">パスポートのNum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4821">지/포트 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4821">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4822">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4822">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4823">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4823">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4824">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4824">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4825">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4826">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4826">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4827">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4828">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4828">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4829">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4829">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4830">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4830">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4831">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4831">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4832">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4833">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4833">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4834">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4835">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4835">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4836">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4836">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4837">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4837">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4838">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4838">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4839">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4839">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4840">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4840">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4841">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4841">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4842">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
