- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4856">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4856">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4857">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4857">d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4858">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4858">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4868">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4868">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4869">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4870">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4870">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4871">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4872">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4872">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4873">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4873">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4874">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4874">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4875">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4875">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4876">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4876">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4877">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4877">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4878">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4878">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4879">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4879">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4880">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4880">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4881">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4881">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4882">3 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4882">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4883">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4884">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4884">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4885">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4886">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4886">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4887">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4887">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4888">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4888">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4889">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4889">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4890">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4890">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4897">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4897">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4910">프랑스 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4910">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4911">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4911">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4912">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4912">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4913">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4913">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4914">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4914">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4915">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4915">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4916">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4916">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4917">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4917">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4918">13 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4918">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4919">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4919">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4920">13 문자 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4920">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4921">두 개의 문자-FR (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4921">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4922">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4922">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4923">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4923">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4924">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4924">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4925">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4925">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4926">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4926">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4927">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4927">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4928">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4928">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4929">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4929">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4930">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4931">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4932">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4933">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4933">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4934">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4934">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4935">Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4935">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4936">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4936">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4937">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4937">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4938">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4938">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4939">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4939">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4940">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4940">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4942">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4942">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4943">부가 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4943">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4944">siren id 없음 numéro d'identification taxe sur siren ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4944">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4945">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4945">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4947">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4947">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4948">numéro de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4948">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4949">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4949">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4950">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4950">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4951">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4951">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4952">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4953">11 자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4953">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4954">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4955">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4955">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4956">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4956">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4957">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4957">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4958">6 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4958">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4959">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4959">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4960">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4960">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4961">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4962">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4962">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4963">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4964">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4964">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4965">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4965">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4966">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4966">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-4967">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-4967">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5116">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5116">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5117">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5117">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5118">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5118">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5119">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5119">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5120">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5121">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5121">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5122">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5122">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5123">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5123">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5124">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5124">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5125">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5125">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5126">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5127">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5127">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5128">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5129">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5129">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5130">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5130">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5131">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5131">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5132">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5132">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5133">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5133">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5134">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5134">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5135">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5135">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5136">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5136">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5137">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5137">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5138">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5138">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5139">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5139">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5140">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5140">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5141">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5141">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5142">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5142">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5143">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5143">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5144">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5144">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5145">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5145">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5146">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5146">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5147">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5147">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5148">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5148">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5149">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5149">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5150">10 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5150">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5151">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5151">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5152">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5152">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5153">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는이 집합의 문자 (C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5153">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5154">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5154">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5155">이 집합의 5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5155">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5156">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5156">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5157">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5158">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5158">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5159">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5160">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5160">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5161">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5161">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5162">From 키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5162">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5163">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5163">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5164">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5165">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5165">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5166">From 키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5166">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5167">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5168">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5168">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5169">Keyword_german_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5169">Keyword_german_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5170">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5170">reisepasse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5171">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5171">reisepassnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5172">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5172">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5173">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5173">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5174">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5174">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5175">Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5175">Passnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5176">reisepässe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5176">reisepässe</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5177">포트 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5177">passeport no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5178">포트 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5178">passeport no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5179">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5179">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5180">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5180">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5181">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5181">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5182">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5182">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5183">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5183">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5184">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5184">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5185">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5185">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5186">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5186">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5187">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5187">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5188">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5188">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5189">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5189">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5190">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5190">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5191">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5191">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5192">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5193">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5193">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5194">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5195">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5196">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5196">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5197">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5197">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5199">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5199">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5225">독일 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5225">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5226">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5226">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5227">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5227">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5228">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5228">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5229">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5229">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5230">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5230">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5231">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5231">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5232">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5232">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5233">11 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5233">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5234">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5234">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5235">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5235">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5236">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5236">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5237">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5237">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5238">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5238">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5239">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5239">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5240">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5240">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5241">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5241">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5242">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5242">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5243">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5243">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5244">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5244">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5245">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5246">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5246">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5247">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5247">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5248">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5248">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5249">Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5249">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5250">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5251">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5251">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5253">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5253">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5261">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5261">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5262">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5263">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5264">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5264">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5265">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5266">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5266">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5267">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5268">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5268">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5269">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5270">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5270">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5271">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5271">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5272">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5272">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5398">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5398">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5399">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5399">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5400">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5400">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5401">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5401">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5402">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5402">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5403">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5403">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5404">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5404">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5405">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5405">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5406">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5406">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5407">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5407">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5408">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5408">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5409">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5409">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5410">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5411">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5411">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5412">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5413">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5414">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5414">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5415">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5415">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5416">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5416">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5417">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5417">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5428">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5428">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5429">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5429">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5430">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5430">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5431">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5431">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5432">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5432">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5433">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5433">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5434">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5434">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5435">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5435">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5436">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5436">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5437">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5437">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5438">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5438">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5439">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5439">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5454">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5454">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5455">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5455">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5456">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5456">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5457">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5457">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5458">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5458">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5459">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5459">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5460">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5460">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5461">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5461">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5462">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5462">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5463">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5463">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5464">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5464">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5465">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5465">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5466">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5466">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5467">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5467">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5468">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5468">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5469">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5469">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5470">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5470">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5471">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5471">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5472">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5472">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5501">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5501">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5502">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5502">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5503">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5503">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5504">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5504">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5505">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5505">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5506">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5506">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5507">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5507">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5508">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5508">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5509">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5510">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5510">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5511">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5512">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5513">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5513">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5514">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5514">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5515">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5515">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5516">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5516">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5517">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5517">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5518">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5518">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>

  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5558">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5558">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5559">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5559">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5560">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5561">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5561">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5562">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5563">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5563">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5564">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5564">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5565">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5565">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5566">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5567">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5567">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5568">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5569">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5569">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5570">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5570">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5571">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5571">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5696">헝가리어 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5696">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5697">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5697">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5698">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5698">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5699">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5699">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5700">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5700">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5701">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5701">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5702">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5702">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5703">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5704">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5704">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5705">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5705">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5706">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5706">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5707">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5707">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5708">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5708">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5709">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5709">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5710">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5710">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5711">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5712">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5712">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5713">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5714">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5715">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5715">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5716">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5716">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5717">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5717">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5718">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5718">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5723">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5723">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5724">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5724">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5725">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5725">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5726">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5726">sz.ig.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5728">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5728">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5729">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5729">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5730">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5730">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5731">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5731">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5732">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5732">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5733">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5733">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5734">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5734">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5735">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5736">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5736">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5737">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5738">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5738">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5739">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5739">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5740">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5740">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5757">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5757">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5758">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5758">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5759">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5759">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5760">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5760">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5761">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5761">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5762">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5762">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5763">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5764">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5764">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5765">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5766">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5767">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5768">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5768">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5769">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5769">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5770">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5770">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5790">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5790">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5791">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5791">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5792">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5792">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5793">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5793">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5794">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5794">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5795">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5795">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5796">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5796">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5797">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5798">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5798">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5799">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5800">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5800">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5801">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5801">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5802">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5802">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5803">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5803">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5804">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5805">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5805">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5806">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5807">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5808">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5809">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5809">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5810">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5810">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5811">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5811">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
