## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5837">헝가리 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5837">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5838">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5838">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5839">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5839">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5840">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5840">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5841">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5841">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5842">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5842">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5843">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5843">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5844">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5845">10 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5845">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5846">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5847">10 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5847">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5848">2 개의 문자-HU 또는 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5848">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5849">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5849">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5850">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5850">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5851">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5852">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5853">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5854">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5854">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5855">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5856">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5856">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5857">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5857">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5858">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5858">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5859">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5859">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5860">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5860">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5861">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5861">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5862">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5862">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5863">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5863">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5864">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5864">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5865">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5865">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5866">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5866">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5867">부가 세금 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5867">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5868">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5868">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5869">általános forgalmi adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5869">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5870">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5870">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5871">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5871">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5872">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5872">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5873">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5873">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5874">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5874">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5875">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5875">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5876">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5876">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5877">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5877">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5878">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (대/소문자 구분 안 함)의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5878">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5879">A 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5879">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5880">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5880">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5881">A 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5881">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5882">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5883">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5884">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5885">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5885">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5886">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5887">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5887">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5888">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5888">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5889">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5889">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5890">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5890">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5891">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5891">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5892">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5892">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5893">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5893">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5894">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5894">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5895">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5896">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5896">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5897">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5898">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5898">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5899">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5899">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5900">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5900">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5901">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5901">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5902">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5902">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5903">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5903">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5904">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5904">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5905">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5906">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5906">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5907">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5908">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5908">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5909">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5909">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5910">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5910">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5911">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5912">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5912">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5913">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5913">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5914">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5914">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5915">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5915">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5916">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5916">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5917">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5917">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5918">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5918">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5919">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5919">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5920">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5920">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5921">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5921">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5922">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5922">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5923">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5923">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5924">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5925">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5925">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5926">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5926">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5927">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5927">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5928">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5928">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5929">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5930">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5930">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5931">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5931">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5932">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5932">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5933">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5933">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5934">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5934">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5935">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5935">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5936">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5937">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5938">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5939">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5940">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5940">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5941">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5941">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5942">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5942">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5943">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5943">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5944">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5944">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5945">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5945">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5946">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5946">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5947">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5947">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5948">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5949">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5949">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5950">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5951">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5951">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5952">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5952">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5953">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5953">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5954">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5954">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5955">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5955">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5956">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5956">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5957">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5957">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5958">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, </c12>,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5958">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5959">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5960">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5960">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5961">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5962">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5962">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5963">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5963">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5964">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5964">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5965">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5965">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5966">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5966">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5967">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5967">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5968">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5969">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5969">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5970">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5971">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5971">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5972">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5972">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5973">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5973">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5974">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5974">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5975">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5975">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5976">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5976">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5977">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5977">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5978">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5979">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5979">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5980">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5980">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5981">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5981">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5982">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5982">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5983">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5983">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5984">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5984">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5985">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5985">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5986">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5989">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5989">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5990">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5991">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5992">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5993">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5993">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5994">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5994">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5995">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5995">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5996">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5996">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5997">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5997">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5998">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5998">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-5999">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-5999">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6000">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6000">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6001">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6001">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6002">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6002">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6003">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6003">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6004">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6004">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6005">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6005">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6006">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6006">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6007">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6007">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6008">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6008">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6009">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6009">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6010">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6010">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6011">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6011">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6012">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6012">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6013">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6013">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6014">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6014">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6015">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6015">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6016">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6016">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6017">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6017">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6018">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6018">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6019">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6019">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6020">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6020">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6021">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6021">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6022">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6022">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6024">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6024">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6029">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6029">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6030">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6030">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6031">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6031">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6032">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6032">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6033">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6033">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6034">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6034">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6035">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6035">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6036">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6036">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6037">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6038">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6038">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6039">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6040">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6040">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6041">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6041">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6042">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6042">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6166">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6166">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6167">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6167">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6168">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6169">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6169">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6170">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6171">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6171">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6172">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6172">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6173">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6173">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6174">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6174">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6175">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6175">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6176">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6176">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6177">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6177">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6178">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6178">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6179">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6179">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6200">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6200">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6201">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6201">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6202">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6202">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6203">7 자리 숫자와 1-2 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6203">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6204">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6204">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6205">7 자리 숫자와 2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6205">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6206">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6206">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6207">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6207">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6208">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6208">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6209">1 ~ 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6209">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6210">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6210">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6211">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6211">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6212">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당 하는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6212">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6213">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6213">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6215">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6217">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6218">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6218">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6219">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6219">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6221">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6222">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6222">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6223">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6268">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6268">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6269">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6269">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6270">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6270">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6271">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6271">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6272">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6272">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6273">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6273">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6274">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6274">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6275">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6275">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6276">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6276">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6277">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6277">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6278">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6278">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6279">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6279">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6280">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6280">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6281">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6281">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6282">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6282">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6283">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6283">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6284">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6284">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6285">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6285">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6286">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6286">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6287">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6287">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6288">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6288">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6289">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6289">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6290">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6290">Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6292">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6292">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6293">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6294">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6294">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6295">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6295">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6296">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6296">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6297">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6298">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6298">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6299">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6300">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6300">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6301">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6301">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6302">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6302">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6303">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6303">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6322">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6322">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6323">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6323">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6324">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6324">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6325">10 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6325">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6326">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6326">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6327">10 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6327">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6328">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6328">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6329">문자 "A" 또는 "V" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6329">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6330">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6330">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6331">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6331">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6332">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6333">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6333">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6334">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6335">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6336">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6336">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6337">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6337">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6338">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6338">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6339">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6339">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6340">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6340">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6341">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6341">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6342">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6342">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6343">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6343">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6344">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6344">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6345">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6345">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6346">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6346">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6347">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6347">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6348">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6348">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6349">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6349">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6350">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6350">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6351">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6351">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6352">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6353">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6353">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6354">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6355">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6355">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6356">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6356">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6357">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6357">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6358">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6358">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6359">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6359">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6360">genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6360">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6361">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6361">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6362">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6362">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6363">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6364">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6364">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6365">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6366">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6366">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6367">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6367">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6368">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6368">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6369">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6369">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6370">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6370">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6405">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6405">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6406">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6406">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6407">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6408">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6408">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6409">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6410">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6410">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6411">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6411">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6412">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6412">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6413">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6414">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6414">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6415">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6416">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6416">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6417">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6417">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6418">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6418">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6419">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6419">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6420">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6420">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6421">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6421">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6422">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6422">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6423">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6423">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6424">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6424">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6425">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6425">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6426">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6426">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6439">이탈리아 값 세금 번호 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6439">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6440">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6440">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6441">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6441">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6442">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6442">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6443">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6443">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6444">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6444">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6445">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6445">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6446">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6447">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6447">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6448">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6449">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6449">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6450">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6450">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6451">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6451">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6452">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6452">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6453">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6453">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6454">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6454">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6455">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6455">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6456">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6456">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6457">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6458">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6458">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6459">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6459">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6460">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6460">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6461">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6461">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6463">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6463">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6469">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6469">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6470">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6470">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6471">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6471">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6472">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6472">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6473">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6473">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6474">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6474">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6475">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6475">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6476">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6476">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6477">공백 또는 대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6477">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6478">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6478">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6479">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6480">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6480">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6481">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6482">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6482">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6483">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6483">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6484">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6484">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6485">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6485">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6486">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6486">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6487">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6487">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6488">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6489">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6489">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6490">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6490">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
