## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6537">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6537">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6538">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6539">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6539">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6540">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6541">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6541">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6542">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6543">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6543">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6544">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6545">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6545">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6546">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6546">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6547">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6547">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6585">일본 내 번호-회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6585">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6586">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6586">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6587">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6587">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6588">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6588">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6589">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6589">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6590">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6590">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6591">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6591">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6592">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6592">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6593">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6593">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6594">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6594">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6595">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6595">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6596">1 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6596">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6597">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6597">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6598">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6598">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6599">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6599">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6600">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6600">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6601">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6601">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6602">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6602">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6603">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6603">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6604">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6604">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6605">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6605">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6606">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6606">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6612">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6612">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6615">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6615">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6616">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6616">法人番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6618">일본 내 번호-개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6618">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6619">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6619">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6620">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6620">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6621">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6621">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6622">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6622">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6623">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6623">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6624">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6624">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6625">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6626">12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6626">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6627">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6628">12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6628">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6629">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6629">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6630">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6630">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6631">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6631">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6632">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6632">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6633">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6633">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6634">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6634">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6635">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6635">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6636">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6636">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6637">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6637">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6638">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6638">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6639">Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6639">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6640">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6640">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6641">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6641">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6646">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6646">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6647">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6647">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6648">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6648">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6649">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6649">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6652">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6652">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6653">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6653">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6654">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6654">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6655">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6655">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6656">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6656">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6657">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6657">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6658">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6658">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6659">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6660">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6661">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6662">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6662">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6663">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6663">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6664">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6664">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6665">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6665">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6666">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6666">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6667">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6667">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6668">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6668">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6669">Passport 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6669">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6670">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6670">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6671">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6671">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6672">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6672">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6673">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6673">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6674">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6674">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6675">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6675">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6676">パスポートNo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6676">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6677">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6677">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6678">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6678">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6679">旅券番号 ♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6679">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6680">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6680">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6681">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6681">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6682">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6683">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6683">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6684">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6685">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6685">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6686">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6686">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6687">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6687">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6688">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6688">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6689">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6690">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6690">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6691">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6692">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6692">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6693">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6693">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6694">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6694">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6695">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6695">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6696">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6696">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6697">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6697">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6698">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6698">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6699">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6699">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6700">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6700">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6701">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6701">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6702">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6702">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6703">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6703">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6704">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6705">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6705">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6706">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6707">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6707">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6708">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6709">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6709">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6710">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6711">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6712">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6712">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6713">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6713">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6714">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6714">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6715">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6715">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6716">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6716">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6717">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6717">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6718">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6718">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6719">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6719">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6720">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6720">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6721">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6721">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6722">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6722">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6723">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6723">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6724">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6724">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6725">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6725">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6726">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6726">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6727">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6728">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6728">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6729">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6730">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6730">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6731">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6731">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6732">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6732">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6733">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6733">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6734">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6734">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6735">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6736">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6736">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6737">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6738">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6738">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6739">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6739">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6740">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6740">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6741">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6741">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6742">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6742">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6743">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6743">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6764">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6764">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6765">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6765">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6766">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6767">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6767">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6768">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6769">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6769">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6770">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6770">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6771">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6771">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6772">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6773">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6773">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6774">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6775">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6775">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6776">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6776">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6777">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6777">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6902">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6902">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6903">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6904">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6904">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6905">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6906">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6906">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6907">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6907">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6908">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6908">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6909">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6909">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6910">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6910">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6911">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6911">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6912">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6912">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6913">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6913">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6914">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6914">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6915">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6915">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6916">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6917">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6917">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6918">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6919">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6919">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6920">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6920">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6921">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6921">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6922">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6922">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6923">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6923">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6986">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6986">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6987">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6987">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6988">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6989">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6989">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6990">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6990">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6991">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6991">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6992">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6992">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6993">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6993">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6994">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6995">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6995">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6996">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6997">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6997">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6998">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6998">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-6999">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-6999">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7019">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7019">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7020">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7020">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7021">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7022">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7022">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7023">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7024">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7024">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7025">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7026">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7026">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7027">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7028">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7028">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7029">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7029">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7030">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7155">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7155">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7156">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7156">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7157">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7157">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7158">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7158">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7159">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7159">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7160">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7160">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7161">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7161">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7162">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7162">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7163">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7163">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7164">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7164">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7165">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7165">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7166">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 (1-6)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7166">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7167">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7167">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7168">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7168">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7169">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7169">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7170">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7171">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7171">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7172">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7173">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7173">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7174">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7174">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7175">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7175">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7176">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7176">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7177">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7177">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7212">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7212">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7213">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7213">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7214">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7215">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7215">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7216">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7217">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7217">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7218">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7219">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7219">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7220">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7222">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7222">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7223">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7223">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7240">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7240">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7241">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7241">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7242">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7242">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7243">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7243">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7244">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7244">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7245">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7245">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7246">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7247">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7250">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7250">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7251">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7251">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7375">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (자연어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7375">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7376">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7376">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7377">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7377">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7378">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7378">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7379">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7379">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7380">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7380">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7381">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7381">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7382">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7382">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7383">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7383">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7384">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7384">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7385">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7385">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7386">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7386">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7387">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7387">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7388">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7388">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7389">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7389">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7390">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7390">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7391">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7391">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7392">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7392">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7393">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7393">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7394">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7394">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7395">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7395">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7418">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7418">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7419">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7419">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7420">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7420">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7421">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7421">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7422">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7422">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7423">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7423">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7424">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7424">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7425">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7425">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7426">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7426">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7427">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7427">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7428">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7428">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7429">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7429">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7430">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7430">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7431">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7431">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7432">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7432">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7433">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7433">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7434">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7434">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7435">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7435">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7436">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (비 자연적인 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7436">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7437">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7438">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7438">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7439">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7440">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7440">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7441">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7441">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7442">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7442">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7443">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7443">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7444">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7444">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7445">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7445">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7446">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7446">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7447">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7447">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7448">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7448">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7449">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7449">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7450">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7450">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7451">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7451">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7452">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7452">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7453">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7453">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7454">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7454">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7455">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7455">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7456">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7456">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7496">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7496">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7497">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7498">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7498">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7499">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7500">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7500">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7501">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7501">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7502">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7502">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7503">두 글자로 된 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7503">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7504">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7504">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7505">임의의 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7505">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7506">1 자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7506">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7507">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7508">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7508">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7509">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7510">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7510">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7511">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7511">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7512">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7512">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7539">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7539">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7540">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7540">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7541">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7541">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7542">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7542">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7543">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7543">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7544">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7544">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7545">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7545">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7546">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7546">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7547">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7547">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7548">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7548">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7549">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7549">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7550">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7550">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7551">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7551">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7552">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7552">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7553">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7553">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7554">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7554">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7555">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7555">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7679">몰타 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7679">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7680">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7680">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7681">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7681">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7682">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7682">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7683">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7683">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7684">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7684">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7685">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7685">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7686">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7687">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7687">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7688">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7689">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7689">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7690">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7690">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7691">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7691">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7692">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7693">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7693">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7694">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7696">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7696">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7697">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7697">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7698">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7698">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7699">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7699">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7703">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7703">id tat-taxxa</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7705">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7705">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7707">numru ta ' taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7707">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7708">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7708">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7709">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7709">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
