- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7711">numru tat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7711">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7712">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7712">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7713">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7713">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7714">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7714">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7715">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7715">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7716">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7716">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7717">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7717">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7718">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7719">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7719">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7720">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7721">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7721">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7722">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7723">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7723">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7724">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7725">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7726">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7726">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7727">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7727">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7728">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7728">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7744">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7744">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7745">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7745">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7746">몰타어 nationals의 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7746">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7747">지정 된 패턴에서 일곱 자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7747">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7748">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7748">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7749">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7749">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7750">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7751">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7751">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7752">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7752">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7753">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7753">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7754">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7754">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7755">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7755">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7756">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7757">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7757">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7758">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7759">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7759">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7760">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7760">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7761">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7761">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7762">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7762">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7763">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7763">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7796">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7796">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7797">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7798">선택 공백이 포함 된 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7798">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7799">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7800">8-9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7800">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7801">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7801">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7802">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7802">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7803">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7803">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7804">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7804">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7805">2-3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7805">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7806">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7807">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7807">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7808">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7809">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7809">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7810">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7810">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7811">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7811">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7812">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7812">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7836">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7836">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7837">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7837">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7838">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7838">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7839">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7839">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7840">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7840">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7841">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7841">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7842">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7843">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7843">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7844">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7845">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7846">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7846">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7847">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7847">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7975">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7975">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7976">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7976">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7977">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7978">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7978">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7979">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7980">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7980">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7981">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7981">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7982">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7982">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7983">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7983">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7984">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7984">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7985">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7985">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7986">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7986">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7987">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7987">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7990">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7990">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7996">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7996">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7997">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7997">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7998">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7998">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-7999">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-7999">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8000">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8000">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8001">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8001">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8002">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8002">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8003">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8004">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8004">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8005">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8006">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8006">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8007">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8008">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8008">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8009">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8010">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8010">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8011">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8011">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8012">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8012">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8013">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8013">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8014">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8014">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8052">네덜란드 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8052">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8053">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8053">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8054">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8054">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8055">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8055">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8056">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8056">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8057">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8057">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8058">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8058">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8059">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8060">14 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8060">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8061">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8062">14 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8062">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8063">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8063">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8064">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8064">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8065">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8065">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8066">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8066">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8067">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8067">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8068">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8068">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8069">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8069">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8070">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8071">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8071">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8072">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8073">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8073">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8074">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8074">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8075">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8075">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8076">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8076">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8077">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8077">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8086">뉴질랜드 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8086">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8087">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8087">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8088">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8088">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8089">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8089">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8090">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8090">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8091">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8091">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8092">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8092">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8093">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8094">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14-16 자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8094">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8095">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8095">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8096">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14 ~ 16 자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8096">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8097">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8097">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8098">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8098">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8099">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8099">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8100">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8100">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8101">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8101">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8102">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8102">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8103">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8103">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8104">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8104">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8105">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8106">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8107">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8108">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8108">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8109">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8109">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8110">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8110">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8111">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8112">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8112">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8120">새 뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8120">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8121">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8121">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8122">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8122">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8123">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8123">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8124">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8124">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8125">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8125">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8126">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8126">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8127">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8128">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8128">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8129">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8130">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8130">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8131">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8131">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8132">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8132">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8133">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8134">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8135">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8136">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8136">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8137">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8137">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8138">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8138">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8139">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8140">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8140">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8144">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8144">driverlicences</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8146">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8146">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8149">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8149">driverslicence</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8207">뉴질랜드 inland 수입 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8207">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8208">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8208">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8209">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8209">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8210">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8210">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8211">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8211">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8212">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8212">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8213">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8213">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8214">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8215">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8215">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8216">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8217">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8217">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8218">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8218">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8219">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8219">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8220">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8220">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8221">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8221">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8222">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8222">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8223">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8224">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8224">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8225">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8226">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8226">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8227">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8227">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8228">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8228">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8229">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8229">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8230">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8230">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8231">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8231">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8232">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8232">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8233">ird 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8233">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8234">ird 아니요 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8234">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8235">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8235">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8236">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8236">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8237">ird 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8237">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8238">inland 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8238">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8239">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8239">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8240">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8241">3 개의 문자, 공백 (선택 사항) 및 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8241">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8242">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8242">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8243">' I ' 및 ' O '를 제외한 3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8243">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8244">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8244">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8245">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8245">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8246">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8247">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8250">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8250">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8251">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8251">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8252">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8253">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8254">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8254">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8255">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8256">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8256">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8257">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8257">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8258">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8258">NHI</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8259">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8259">New Zealand</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8269">뉴질랜드 공유 wlefare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8269">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8270">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8270">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8271">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8271">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8272">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8272">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8273">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8273">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8274">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8274">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8275">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8275">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8276">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8277">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8277">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8278">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8279">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8279">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8280">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8280">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8281">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8281">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8282">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8282">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8283">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8283">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8284">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8284">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8285">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8286">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8287">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8288">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8289">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8289">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8290">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8290">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8291">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8291">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8292">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8292">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8293">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8293">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8294">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8294">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8295">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8295">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8296">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8296">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8297">소셜 welfare No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8297">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8298">소셜 welfare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8298">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8299">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8299">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8300">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8300">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8301">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8302">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8302">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8303">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8304">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8304">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8305">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8305">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8306">3 자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8306">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8307">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8307">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8308">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8309">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8310">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8311">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8311">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8312">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8312">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8313">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8313">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8314">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8314">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8315">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8315">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8316">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8316">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8317">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8317">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8323">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8323">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8326">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8326">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8327">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8328">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8328">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8330">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8330">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8331">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8331">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8332">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8332">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8333">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8333">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8334">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8334">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8335">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8335">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8336">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8337">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8337">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8338">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8339">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8340">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8340">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8341">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8341">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8342">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8342">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8343">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8343">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8344">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8344">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8345">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8345">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8346">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8346">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8347">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8347">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8348">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8348">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8349">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8349">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8350">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8350">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8351">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8351">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8352">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8352">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8353">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8353">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8354">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8354">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8355">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8355">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8356">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8356">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8357">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8357">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8358">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8358">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8360">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8363">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8363">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8364">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8364">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8488">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8488">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8489">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8489">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8490">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8490">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8491">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8491">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8492">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8492">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8493">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8494">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8494">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8495">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8496">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8496">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8497">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8497">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8498">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8498">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8499">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8500">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8500">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8501">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8501">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8503">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8503">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8504">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8504">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8505">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8505">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8507">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8507">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8510">폴란드 국가 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8510">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8511">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8511">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8512">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8512">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8513">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8513">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8514">YYMMDD 형식의 출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8514">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8515">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8515">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8516">1 개 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8516">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8517">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8518">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8519">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8520">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8520">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8521">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8521">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8522">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8522">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8523">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8524">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8524">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8525">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8525">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8526">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8533">veiligheid.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8533">nr.-pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8538">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8538">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8539">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8539">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8540">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8541">2 개의 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8541">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8542">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8543">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8543">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8544">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8545">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8545">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8546">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8547">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8547">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8548">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8548">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8549">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8549">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8550">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8550">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8551">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8551">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8552">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8552">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8556">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8556">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8557">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8557">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8558">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8558">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8559">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8559">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8560">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8560">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8561">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8561">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8562">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8562">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8563">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8563">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8564">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8565">9 자리 또는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8565">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8566">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8567">9 자리 숫자 또는 14 자리 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8567">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8568">9 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8568">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8569">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8569">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8570">슬래시나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8570">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8571">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8571">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8572">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8572">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8573">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8573">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8574">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8574">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8575">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8575">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8576">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8576">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8577">Keywords_polish_regon_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8577">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8578">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8578">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8579">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8579">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
