## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8596">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8596">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8597">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8597">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8598">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8598">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8599">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8599">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8600">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8600">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8601">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8601">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8602">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8602">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8603">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8604">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8604">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8605">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8606">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8606">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8607">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8608">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8608">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8609">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8610">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8610">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8611">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8611">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8612">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8612">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8642">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8642">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8643">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8644">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8644">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8645">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8645">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8646">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8646">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8647">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8648">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8648">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8649">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8650">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8650">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8651">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8651">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8652">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8652">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8672">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8672">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8673">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8673">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8674">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8675">두 개의 패턴-다음에 특수 문자가 있는 5-8 자리 문자 두 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8675">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8676">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8677">패턴 1: 다음에 특수 문자를 포함 하는 5/6 문자 2 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8677">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8678">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8678">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8679">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8679">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8680">5 또는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8680">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8681">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8681">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8682">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8682">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8683">패턴 2:1 개 문자 다음에 특수 문자가 있는 6/8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8683">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8684">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8684">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8685">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8685">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8686">6 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8686">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8687">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8687">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8688">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8688">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8689">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8690">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8690">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8691">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8692">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8692">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8693">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8693">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8694">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8694">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8826">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8826">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8827">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8827">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8828">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8828">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8829">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8829">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8830">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8830">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8831">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8831">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8832">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8832">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8833">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8833">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8834">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8834">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8835">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8835">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8836">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8836">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8837">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8837">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8838">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8838">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8839">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8839">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8863">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8863">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8864">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8865">선택 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8865">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8866">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8867">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8867">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8868">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8868">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8869">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8869">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8870">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8870">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8871">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8871">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8872">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8873">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8873">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8874">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8875">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8875">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8876">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8876">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8877">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8878">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8878">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8879">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8879">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8904">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8904">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8905">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8906">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8907">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8907">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8908">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8909">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8909">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8910">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8910">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8911">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8911">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8912">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8913">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8913">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8914">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8915">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8915">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8916">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8916">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-8917">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-8917">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9045">루마니아 p (personal numeric code)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9045">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9046">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9046">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9047">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9047">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9048">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9048">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9049">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9049">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9050">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9050">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9051">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9051">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9052">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9053">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9053">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9054">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9054">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9055">1 자리 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9055">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9056">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9056">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9057">2 자리 숫자 (01-52 또는 99 일 수 있음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9057">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9058">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9058">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9059">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9060">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9060">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9061">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9062">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9063">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9063">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9064">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9064">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9065">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9065">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9066">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9066">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9117">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9117">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9118">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9118">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9119">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9119">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9120">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9120">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9121">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9121">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9122">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9122">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9123">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9123">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9124">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9124">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9125">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9125">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9126">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9126">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9127">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9127">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9128">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9128">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9129">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9129">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9130">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9130">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9131">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9131">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9132">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9132">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9133">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9133">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9134">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9134">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9135">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9135">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9137">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9137">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9138">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9138">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9140">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9140">passport numbers</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9143">러시아 (국내) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9143">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9144">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9144">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9145">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9145">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9146">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9146">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9147">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9147">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9148">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9148">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9149">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9149">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9150">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9151">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9151">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9153">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9153">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9154">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9155">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9155">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9156">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9156">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9157">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9157">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9158">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9158">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9159">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9160">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9161">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9162">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9163">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9163">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9164">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9164">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9188">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9191">9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9191">nine digit number:</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9217">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9217">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9218">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9218">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9219">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9219">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9220">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9220">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9221">10 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9221">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9222">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9223">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9223">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9224">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9225">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9225">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9226">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9226">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9227">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9227">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9228">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9228">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9232">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9232">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9233">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9233">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9234">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9234">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9235">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9236">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9236">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9237">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9237">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9238">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9238">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9239">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9239">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9240">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9240">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9241">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9241">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9242">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9242">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9243">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9243">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9244">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9244">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9245">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9245">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9246">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9246">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9247">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9247">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9248">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9248">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9250">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9250">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9251">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9251">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9262">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9262">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9263">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9263">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9264">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9265">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9265">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9266">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9267">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9267">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9268">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9268">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9269">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9269">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9270">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9271">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9271">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9272">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9273">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9273">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9274">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9274">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9275">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9275">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9401">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9401">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9402">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9402">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9403">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9403">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9404">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9404">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9405">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9405">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9406">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9406">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9407">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9407">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9408">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9409">선택적 백슬래시를 포함 하는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9409">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9410">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9410">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9411">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9411">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9412">선택적 슬래시 (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9412">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9413">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9413">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9414">1 개의 선택적 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9414">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9415">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9416">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9416">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9417">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9418">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9418">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9419">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9419">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9420">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9420">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9421">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9421">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9422">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9422">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9469">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9469">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9470">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9470">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9471">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9471">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9472">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9472">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9473">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9473">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9474">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9474">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9475">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9476">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9476">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9477">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9478">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9478">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9479">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9479">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9480">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9480">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9499">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9499">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9500">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9500">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9501">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9501">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9502">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9502">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9503">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9503">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9504">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9504">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9505">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9506">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9506">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9507">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9508">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9508">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9509">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9509">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9510">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9510">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9637">슬로베니아 고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9637">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9638">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9638">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9639">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9639">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9640">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9640">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9641">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9641">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9642">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9642">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9643">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9643">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9644">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9645">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9645">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9646">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9647">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9647">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9648">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9648">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9649">출생 "50" 영역에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9649">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9650">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9650">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9651">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9651">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9652">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9653">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9653">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9654">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9655">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9655">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9656">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9656">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9657">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9657">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9658">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9659">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9659">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9687">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9687">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9688">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9688">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9689">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9690">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9690">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9691">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9692">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9692">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9693">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9693">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9694">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9694">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9695">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9695">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9696">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9697">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9697">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9699">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9700">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9700">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9701">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9701">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9721">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9721">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9722">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9722">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9723">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9723">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9724">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9724">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9725">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9725">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9726">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9726">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9727">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9727">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9728">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9728">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9729">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9729">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9730">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9730">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9731">1-9의 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9731">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9732">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9732">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9733">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9733">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9734">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9735">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9735">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9736">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9737">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9737">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9738">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9738">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9739">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9739">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9740">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9740">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9741">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9741">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9751">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9751">tax identification number</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9765">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9765">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9766">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9767">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9767">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9768">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9769">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9769">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9770">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9770">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9771">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9771">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9772">1 자리 참여 지표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9772">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9773">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9773">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9774">체크섬 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9774">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9775">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9776">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9776">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9777">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9778">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9778">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9779">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9779">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9780">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9780">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9781">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9781">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9782">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9782">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9783">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9783">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9784">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9784">Identity card</span></span>
