- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9786">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9786">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9787">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9787">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9788">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9789">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9789">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9790">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9791">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9791">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9792">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9792">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9793">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9793">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9794">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9794">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9795">4 자리 출생 지역 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9795">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9796">이전 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분 하는 데 사용 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9796">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9797">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9797">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9798">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9799">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9799">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9800">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9801">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9801">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9802">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9802">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9803">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9803">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9804">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9804">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9805">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9805">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9806">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9806">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9807">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9807">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9808">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9808">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9809">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9809">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9810">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9810">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9811">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9811">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9812">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9812">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9813">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9813">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9814">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9814">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9815">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9815">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9816">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9816">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9817">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9818">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9818">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9819">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9820">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9820">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9821">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9821">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9822">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9822">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9823">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9824">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9824">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9825">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9826">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9826">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9827">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9827">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9828">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9828">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9829">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9829">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9830">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9830">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9964">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9964">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9965">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9966">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9967">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9968">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9969">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9970">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9971">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9972">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9972">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9974">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9974">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9975">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9975">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9976">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9976">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9977">1 개의 확인 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9977">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9978">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9979">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9979">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9980">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9981">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9981">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9982">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9982">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9983">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9984">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9984">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-9985">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-9985">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10006">개인 id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10006">personal identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10007">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10007">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10008">uniqueid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10008">uniqueid#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10009">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10009">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10010">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10010">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10011">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10012">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10012">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10013">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10014">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10014">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10015">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10015">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10016">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10016">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10017">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10017">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10018">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10018">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10019">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10019">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10020">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10020">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10021">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10021">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10022">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10022">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10023">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10023">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10024">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10024">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10026">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10026">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10027">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10027">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10028">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10028">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10029">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10029">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10030">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10030">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10035">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10035">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10036">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10036">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10037">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10037">libreta pasaporte</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10041">número de pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10041">número de pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10042">números pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10042">números pasaporte</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10046">pasaporte 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10046">pasaporte no.</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10049">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10049">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10050">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10050">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10051">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10052">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10052">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10053">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10054">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10054">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10055">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10055">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10056">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10056">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10057">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10057">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10058">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10058">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10059">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10059">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10060">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10061">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10062">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10063">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10063">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10064">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10064">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10065">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10065">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10066">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10066">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10067">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10067">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10068">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10068">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10069">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10069">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10070">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10070">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10071">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10071">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10072">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10072">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10073">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10073">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10074">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10074">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10075">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10075">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10076">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10076">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10077">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10077">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10078">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10078">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10079">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10079">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10080">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10080">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10081">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10081">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10082">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10082">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10083">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10083">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10084">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10084">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10085">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10085">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10086">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10086">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10087">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10087">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10088">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10088">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10089">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10089">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10090">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10090">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10091">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10091">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10092">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10092">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10093">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10093">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10094">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10094">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10095">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10095">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10096">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10096">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10097">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10098">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10098">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10099">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10100">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10100">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10101">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10101">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10102">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10102">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10103">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10103">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10104">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10104">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10135">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10135">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10136">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10136">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10137">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10137">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10138">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10138">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10139">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10139">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10140">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10140">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10141">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10141">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10142">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10142">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10143">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10143">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10144">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10144">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10145">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10145">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10146">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10147">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10147">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10148">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10149">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10149">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10150">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10150">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10151">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10151">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10152">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10152">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10153">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10153">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10154">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10154">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10155">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10155">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10156">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10156">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10157">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10157">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10158">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10158">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10159">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10159">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10160">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10160">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10161">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10161">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10162">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10162">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10163">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10163">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10164">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10164">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10165">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10165">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10166">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10166">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10167">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10167">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10168">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10168">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10169">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10169">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10170">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10170">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10171">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10171">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10172">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10172">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10173">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10173">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10174">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10174">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10175">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10175">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10176">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10176">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10177">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10177">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10178">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10178">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10179">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10179">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10180">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10180">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10181">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10181">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10182">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10182">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10183">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10184">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10184">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10186">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10186">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10187">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10187">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10188">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10188">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10189">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10189">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10190">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10190">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10191">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10191">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10192">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10192">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10193">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10193">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10194">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10194">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10195">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10195">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10328">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10328">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10329">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10330">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10330">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10332">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10332">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10333">두 자리 숫자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10333">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10334">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10334">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10335">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+" (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10335">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10336">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10336">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10337">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10337">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10338">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10338">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10339">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10339">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10340">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10340">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10341">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10341">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10342">From 키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10342">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10343">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10343">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10344">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10345">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10345">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10346">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10346">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10365">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10365">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10366">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10366">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10367">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10368">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10368">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10369">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10370">8 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10370">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10371">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10372">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10373">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10374">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10374">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10375">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10375">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10376">다음 중 하나가 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10376">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10377">Keyword_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10377">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10378">Keyword_sweden_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10378">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10409">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10409">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10410">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10410">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10411">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10412">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10412">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10413">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10414">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10414">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10415">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10415">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10416">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10416">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10417">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10417">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10418">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10418">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10419">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10419">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10420">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10421">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10421">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10422">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10423">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10423">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10424">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10424">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10425">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10425">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10426">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10426">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10427">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10427">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10443">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10443">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10444">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10444">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10445">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10445">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10446">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10446">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10447">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10447">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10448">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10448">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10449">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10449">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10450">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10450">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10451">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10451">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10452">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10452">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10453">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10453">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10454">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10454">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10455">더하기 기호 또는 빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10455">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10456">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10456">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10457">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10457">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10458">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10458">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10459">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10459">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10460">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10461">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10461">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10462">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10463">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10463">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10464">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10464">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10465">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10465">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10466">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10466">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10467">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10467">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10493">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10493">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10494">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10495">4 개 문자 다음에 5-31 자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10495">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10496">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10497">4 개의 문자와 5-31 자의 문자 또는 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10497">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10498">4 문자 은행 코드 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10498">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10499">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10499">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10500">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10500">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10501">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10501">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10502">1 ~ 3 개의 문자 또는 숫자 (BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10502">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10503">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10504">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10504">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10505">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10506">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10506">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10507">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10507">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10508">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10508">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10545">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10545">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10546">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10546">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10547">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10547">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10548">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10548">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10549">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10549">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10550">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10550">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10551">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10551">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10552">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10553">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10553">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10554">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10555">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10555">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10556">3 자리 숫자-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10556">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10557">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10557">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10558">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10558">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10559">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10559">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10560">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10560">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10561">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10561">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10562">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10562">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10563">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10563">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10564">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10564">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10565">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10565">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10566">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10566">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10567">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10567">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10568">Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10568">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10569">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10569">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10570">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10570">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10591">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10591">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10592">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10592">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10593">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10593">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10594">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10594">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10595">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10595">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10596">1 개 문자 (영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10596">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10597">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10597">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10598">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10598">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10599">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10599">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10600">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10600">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10601">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10601">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10602">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10602">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10603">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10603">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10604">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10604">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10605">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10605">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10606">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10606">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10607">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10607">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10608">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10608">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
