- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10620">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10620">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10621">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10621">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10622">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10622">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10623">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10623">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10624">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10624">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10625">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10625">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10626">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10626">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10627">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10627">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10628">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10628">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10629">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10629">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10630">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10630">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10631">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10631">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10632">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10632">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10633">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10633">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10634">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10634">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10635">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10636">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10636">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10637">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10638">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10638">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10639">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10639">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10640">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10640">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10641">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10641">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10642">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10642">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10643">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10643">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10644">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10644">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10645">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10645">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10646">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10646">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10647">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10647">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10648">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10648">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10649">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10649">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10650">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10650">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10651">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10651">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10652">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10653">10 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10653">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10654">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10655">10 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10655">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10656">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10656">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10657">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10657">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10658">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10659">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10660">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10661">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10661">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10662">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10662">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10663">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10663">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10664">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10664">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10665">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10665">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10671">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10671">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10672">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10672">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10677">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10677">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10678">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10678">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10679">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10679">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10680">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10680">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10681">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10681">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10682">첫 번째 숫자는 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10682">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10683">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10683">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10684">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10684">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10685">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10685">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10686">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10686">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10687">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10687">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10688">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10688">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10689">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10689">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10690">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10690">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10691">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10691">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10692">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10692">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10693">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10693">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10694">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10694">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10695">Id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10695">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10696">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10696">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10697">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10697">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10698">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10698">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10699">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10699">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10700">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10700">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10701">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10702">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10702">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10703">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10703">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10704">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10704">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10705">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10706">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10706">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10707">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10708">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10708">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10709">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10709">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10710">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10710">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10711">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10712">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10712">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10713">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10713">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10714">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10714">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10715">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10715">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10716">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10716">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10717">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10717">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10718">Vatandaşlık 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10718">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10719">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10719">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10720">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10720">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10721">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10721">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10722">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10723">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10723">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10724">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10725">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10725">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10726">5 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10726">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10727">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10727">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10728">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10728">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10729">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10729">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10730">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10730">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10731">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10732">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10732">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10733">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10734">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10735">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10735">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10736">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10736">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10737">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10755">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10755">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10756">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10756">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10757">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10758">2 개의 문자와 1-4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10758">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10759">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10760">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10760">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10761">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10762">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10762">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10763">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10764">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10765">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10765">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10766">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10766">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10767">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10767">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10773">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10773">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10774">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10774">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10775">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10776">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10776">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10777">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10778">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10778">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10779">3 또는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10779">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10780">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10780">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10781">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10781">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10782">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10782">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10783">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10783">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10784">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10785">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10785">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10786">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10787">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10787">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10788">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10788">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10789">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10789">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10790">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10790">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10791">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10791">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10792">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10792">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10793">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10808">D. O. B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10808">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10809">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10809">Date of Birth</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10811">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10811">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10812">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10812">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10813">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10813">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10814">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10815">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 개 문자 또는 9 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10815">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10816">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10817">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10817">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10818">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10818">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10819">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10819">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10820">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10820">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10821">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10821">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10822">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10822">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10823">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10823">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10824">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10824">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10825">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10825">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10826">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10826">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10827">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10827">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10828">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10828">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10829">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10829">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10830">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10830">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10831">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10831">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10832">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10832">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10833">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10833">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10834">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10834">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10835">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10835">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10836">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10836">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10837">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10837">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10838">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10838">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10860">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10860">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10861">고유 Taxpayer 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10861">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10862">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10862">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10863">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10863">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10864">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10864">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10865">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10865">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10866">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10866">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10867">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10867">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10868">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10869">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10869">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10870">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10871">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10871">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10872">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10873">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10873">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10874">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10875">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10875">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10876">이 함수는 해당  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10876">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10877">From 키워드를  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10877">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10897">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10897">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10898">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10898">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10899">6-17 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10899">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10900">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10900">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10901">6-17 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10901">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10902">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10903">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10903">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10904">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10905">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10905">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10906">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10906">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10907">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10907">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10913">Checking Acct Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10913">Checking Acct Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10914">Checking Acct #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10914">Checking Acct #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10915">Checking Acct No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10915">Checking Acct No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10916">Checking Account No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10916">Checking Account No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10917">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10917">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10918">Bank Account #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10918">Bank Account #</span></span>

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10937">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10937">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10938">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10939">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10939">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10941">주 (예: 뉴욕)에 따라 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10941">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10942">ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10942">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10943">ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10943">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10944">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10945">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10947">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10947">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10948">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10948">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10949">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10949">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10950">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10950">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10951">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10951">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10952">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10952">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10953">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10953">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10954">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10954">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-10955">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-10955">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11042">Driver's Lic#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11042">Driver's Lic#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11043">Driver's Lics#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11043">Driver's Lics#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11044">Driver's License#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11044">Driver's License#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11045">Driver's Licenses#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11045">Driver's Licenses#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11046">id card#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11046">id card#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11047">id cards#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11047">id cards#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11048">identification card#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11048">identification card#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11049">identification cards#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11049">identification cards#</span></span> 


#### <a name="keyword_state_name_drivers_license_name"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11050">Keyword_ [state_name] _drivers_license_name</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11050">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11051">상태 약어 (예: "\ \")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11051">state abbreviation (for example, "NY")</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11052">상태 이름 (예: "뉴욕")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11052">state name (for example, "New York")</span></span>

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11053">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11053">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11054">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11054">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11055">"9"로 시작 하 고, "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함 하 고, 필요에 따라 공백이 나 대시로 서식이 지정 된 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11055">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11056">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11057">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11057">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11058">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11058">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11059">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11059">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11060">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11060">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11061">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11061">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11062">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11062">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11063">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11063">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11064">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11064">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11065">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11065">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11066">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11066">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11067">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11067">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11068">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11068">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11069">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11069">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11070">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11071">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11071">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11072">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11073">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11073">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11074">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11074">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11075">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11075">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11076">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11076">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11077">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11077">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11078">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11078">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11079">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11079">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11080">Func_formatted_itin 또는 Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11080">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11081">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11081">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11082">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11082">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11086">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11086">itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11092">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11092">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11093">taxid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11093">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11094">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11094">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11095">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11095">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11096">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11096">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11097">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11097">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11098">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11098">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11099">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11100">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11100">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11101">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11101">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11102">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11102">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11103">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11103">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11104">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11104">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11105">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11106">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11106">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11107">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11108">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11108">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11109">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11109">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11110">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11110">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11111">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11112">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11112">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11113">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11113">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11114">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11114">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11115">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11115">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11116">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11116">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11117">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11117">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11118">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11118">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11119">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11119">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11120">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11120">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11121">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11121">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11122">SSA 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11122">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11123">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11123">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11124">소셜 보안 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11124">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11125">소셜 보안 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11125">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11126">소셜 보안 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11126">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11127">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11127">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11128">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11128">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11129">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11129">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11130">있는 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11130">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11131">SSN #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11131">SSN#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11132">대비 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11132">SS#</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11134">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11134">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11135">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11135">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11136">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11136">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11137">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11137">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11138">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11139">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11139">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11140">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11141">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11141">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11142">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11143">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11143">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11144">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11145">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11145">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11146">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11146">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11147">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11147">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11168">우크라이나 passport 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11168">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11169">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11169">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11170">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11170">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11171">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11171">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11172">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11172">information governance</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11174">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11174">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11175">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11176">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11176">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11177">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11178">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11178">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11179">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11180">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11180">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11181">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11182">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11182">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11183">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11183">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11184">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11184">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11193">우크라이나 여권 국제 전화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11193">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11194">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11194">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11195">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11195">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11196">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11196">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11197">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11197">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11198">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11198">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11199">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11199">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11200">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11201">8 자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11201">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11202">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11203">8 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11203">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11204">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11204">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11205">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11205">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11206">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11207">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11207">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11208">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11209">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11210">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11210">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11211">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11211">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11212">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11212">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11214">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11214">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11215">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11215">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11217">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11217">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ce50d-11218">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce50d-11218">номер паспорта</span></span>
